pages.text: $(mod)Connected Glass$() adds four new glass types. When any of the same type are placed next to each other, their textures will connect to make one larger window.$(br2)Each type comes in all colors, and has a Glass Pane version as well.

$(item)Connecting Glass$() is just normal Glass.$(br2)$(item)Clear Glass$() does not have streaks.$(br2)$(item)Scratched Glass$() uses the older Glass texture.$(br2)$(item)Connecting Tinted Glass$() acts as Tinted Glass.
